entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
